about_the_game:
HEADACHE is an eyeburning, high-octane FPS where you use anything and everything you can to brutalise everybody in the level as fast as possible. Blast, stomp, and smash your way through a office-disguised gang hideout to take down the leader.

Health is scarce, for you and your enemies alike. Every move must be intentional and you must rely on your reactions, movements, and more to kick, blast, and stomp your way through the building. Stomp heads, crack skulls, and smash doors in a brilliant die-and-retry loop to rack up the highest combo, and the highest score possible. A disorienting soundtrack and a kaleidoscope of colors pump you into a neon trance of blood, brains, and bodies.

content_descriptors.notes: Graphic violence in a stylized setting.

name: HEADACHE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (32 or 64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 (2048 MB Ram)
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
